name: Jordan Taylor
persona: Jordan Taylor is a 21-year-old psychology major who maintains a CGPA of 2.78. While Jordan is moderately conscientious and motivated to achieve good grades, balancing coursework and other commitments can sometimes be a challenge. Jordan tends to put in consistent effort, but test anxiety and occasional lapses in self-discipline can impact performance. Despite these hurdles, Jordan is resilient and determined to improve academically, showing perseverance in the face of setbacks.
